thread.title: IT'S OFFICIAL: Bar Refaeli is off the market—sorry, boys! - Swim Daily
thread.title_full: IT'S OFFICIAL: Bar Refaeli is off the market—sorry, boys! - Swim Daily - SI.com

author: Kelsey Hendrix
title: IT'S OFFICIAL: Bar Refaeli is off the market—sorry, boys! - Swim Daily
text:
by Kelsey Hendrix Posted: Thu Oct. 1, 2015 We're terribly sorry to be crushing your hopes and dreams on a Thursday afternoon, but former SI Swimsuit cover model Bar Refaeli is officially off the market!
Bar and now-husband Adi Ezra exchanged vows in front of approximately 300 family members and friends last Thursday at the Carmel Forest Spa Resort in Haifa, Israel. According to Israeli news site Walla!, the beautiful bride walked down the aisle as Israeli singer Shlomi Shabbat performed his song, "The Beginning of the World."
And to the delight of fans and admirers around the world, Bar has released the first photo from the "happiest day of [her] life" on Instagram, meaning we can officially obsess over how she's the most gorgeous bride we've possibly ever seen.
The happiest day of my life ! I married my best friend Live, Laugh, Love together forever More pics exclusively in @holacom magazine
A photo posted by Bar Refaeli (@barrefaeli) on Sep 30, 2015 at 12:21am PDT
Bar opted for a chic, boho-inspired, flowing Chloe design, which featured a short train, intricate lace detailing and ornate tassels. Skipping the veil, she chose a no-fuss hairstyle of tousled waves and soft twists. The six-time SI Swimsuit model finished off the look with statement drop earrings and left us all in awe of just how naturally beautiful she really is.
In preparation for the big day, Bar shared a super sexy, bikini-clad photo from her bachelorette party. Did we mention she's 100% still got it? I mean, look at THAT bridal bod. She's hot, hot, hot!
This time tomorrow... I'll be dancing in white
A photo posted by Bar Refaeli (@barrefaeli) on Sep 23, 2015 at 10:06am PDT
SI Swimsuit is wishing Bar and her husband Adi only the best in their new marriage!
BONUS: See some of Bar's best moments from SI Swimsuit!
